abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio plans to name Thomas G Snyder, longtime labor organizer and liberal advocate, as his next chief of staff; Snyder was also formerly a close aide to Boston Mayor Raymond W Flynn.
lead_paragraph: Thomas G. Snyder, who has earned a place in the mayor’s close-knit circle, is a longtime labor organizer and liberal advocate.

headline.main: De Blasio to Name Former ‘Right-Hand Man’ of Boston Mayor as His Chief of Staff
headline.print_headline: De Blasio to Name Former ‘Right-Hand Man’ of Boston Mayor as His Chief of Staff
